entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2 except minus 3 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 2 except minus 3 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4 except minus 8 over the Highlands.
